statements: SELECT * FROM boxer_rankings
SELECT boxer_name, boxing_category FROM boxer_rankings WHERE wins > 10
SELECT boxer_name, wins, losses FROM boxer_rankings ORDER BY wins DESC
SELECT * FROM boxer_rankings WHERE boxing_category = 'Heavyweight'
SELECT boxer_name, losses, draws FROM boxer_rankings WHERE draws >= 1 ORDER BY losses ASC
SELECT * FROM boxer_rankings WHERE boxer_name = 'Mike Tyson';
SELECT boxer_name, wins, losses FROM boxer_rankings WHERE boxing_category = 'Heavyweight' ORDER BY wins DESC;
SELECT boxer_name, boxing_category, draws FROM boxer_rankings WHERE wins > 20 AND losses < 5 ORDER BY draws ASC, boxer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM boxer_rankings WHERE wins >= 15 OR (draws > 0 AND boxing_category = 'Middleweight') ORDER BY wins DESC, losses ASC;
SELECT boxer_name, wins, losses FROM boxer_rankings WHERE boxing_category = 'Lightweight' AND (wins + losses) > 10 ORDER BY wins DESC, losses ASC;
SELECT * FROM boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight';
SELECT name, wins, losses FROM boxers WHERE wins > losses ORDER BY wins DESC;
SELECT * FROM boxers WHERE name LIKE 'M%';
SELECT boxer1_id, boxer2_id, match_date FROM matches WHERE winner_id IS NULL;
SELECT name, weight_class, wins FROM boxers ORDER BY wins DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT name, weight_class FROM boxers WHERE wins > 10 ORDER BY wins DESC
SELECT * FROM boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight' AND wins >= 5 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, name, wins, losses FROM boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Welterweight' AND (wins > losses OR losses = 0)
SELECT match_id, match_date, b1.name AS boxer1_name, b2.name AS boxer2_name FROM matches INNER JOIN boxers b1 ON matches.boxer1_id = b1.id INNER JOIN boxers b2 ON matches.boxer2_id = b2.id
SELECT b.name AS winner_name, m.match_date, m.match_id, m.loser_id FROM matches m INNER JOIN boxers b ON m.winner_id = b.id WHERE m.match_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM boxers;
SELECT name, weight_class FROM boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Middleweight';
SELECT name, rank FROM boxers b JOIN rankings r ON b.id = r.boxer_id;
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT b.name AS boxer_name, m.match_date AS fight_date, r.rank AS ranking FROM boxers b JOIN matches m ON b.id = m.boxer1_id JOIN rankings r ON b.id = r.boxer_id WHERE r.rank <= 5;
SELECT * FROM boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight';
SELECT name, weight_class FROM boxers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT boxer1_id, boxer2_id, match_date FROM matches WHERE winner_id IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_matches FROM matches;
SELECT boxer_id, rank, points FROM rankings ORDER BY rank ASC, points DESC;
SELECT * FROM Boxers;
SELECT boxer_name, weight_class FROM Boxers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT boxer_name, weight_class, country FROM Boxers ORDER BY boxer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Titles WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight' ORDER BY title_name ASC;
SELECT match_id, date, venue FROM Matches WHERE winner_id = 101 OR loser_id = 102;
SELECT * FROM Boxers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT boxer_name, weight_class FROM Boxers ORDER BY boxer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Matches WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT winner_id, loser_id FROM Matches WHERE venue = 'Madison Square Garden';
SELECT title_name, weight_class, current_holder_id FROM Titles WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight' ORDER BY title_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM boxer WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight';
SELECT name, wins, losses FROM boxer ORDER BY wins DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM match WHERE result = 'KO';
SELECT boxer.name, ranking.points FROM boxer INNER JOIN ranking ON boxer.id = ranking.boxer_id WHERE ranking.weight_class = 'Middleweight';
SELECT opponent.name, wins, losses FROM opponent ORDER BY wins DESC, losses ASC;
SELECT * FROM boxer WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight';
SELECT name, wins, losses FROM boxer ORDER BY wins DESC;
SELECT * FROM match WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, wins, losses FROM opponent WHERE wins > 10 AND losses < 5;
SELECT boxer.name, ranking.points FROM boxer JOIN ranking ON boxer.id = ranking.boxer_id WHERE ranking.weight_class = 'Middleweight';
